A report has been logged and a team of b: A report has been logged and a team of bug-squashing squirrels has been dispatched to deal with the situation.
Password reset not enabled. Contact your: Password reset not enabled. Contact your administrator.
Enter your email address below and we'll: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
Password reset. Log in with your new pas: Password reset. Log in with your new password
You have requested a link to change your: You have requested a link to change your password. You can do this through this link:
If you did not request this, please igno: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
Your password will not change until you: Your password will not change until you access the link above and set a new one.
Restart server. Try reloading the page a: Restart server. Try reloading the page after a few seconds after pressing this button.
Hosting on this site is provided for fre: Hosting on this site is provided for free and with no guarantee of availability or security of your application.
This facility is intended solely for you: This facility is intended solely for you to evaluate the suitability of Saltcorn.
If you would like to store private infor: If you would like to store private information that needs to be secure, please use self-hosted Saltcorn.
Please select a name for your applicatio: Please select a name for your application. The name will determine the address at which it will be available.
Success! Your new application is availab: Success! Your new application is available at:
Please click the above link now to creat: Please click the above link now to create the first user.
A site with this subdomain already exist: A site with this subdomain already exists
Four different ways to get started using: Four different ways to get started using Saltcorn
Start by creating the tables to hold you: Start by creating the tables to hold your data
When you have created the tables, you ca: When you have created the tables, you can create views so users can interact with the data.
You can also start by creating a page.
You can skip creating a table by hand by: You can skip creating a table by hand by uploading a CSV file from a spreadsheet.
If you have a backup from a previous Sal: If you have a backup from a previous Saltcorn instance, you can also restore it.
Instead of building, get up and running: Instead of building, get up and running in no time with packs
Packs are collections of tables, views a: Packs are collections of tables, views and plugins that give you a full application which you can then edit to suit your needs.
Name: Name
The Wiki contains the documentation and: The Wiki contains the documentation and tutorials on installing and using Saltcorn

You can copy the pack contents below to: You can copy the pack contents below to another Saltcorn installation.

Table saved with version history enabled: Table saved with version history enabled
Label: Label

Title: Title
The root page is the page that is served: The root page is the page that is served when the user visits the home location (/). This can be set for each user role.
A default value is required when adding: A default value is required when adding required fields to nonempty tables
Please create your first user account, w: Please create your first user account, which will have administrative privileges. You can add other users and give them administrative privileges later.
Views define how table rows are displaye: Views define how table rows are displayed to the user
Tables hold collections of similar data: Tables hold collections of similar data
Role required to access added files: Role required to access added files

Not allowed to write to table %s: Not allowed to write to table %s
View %s added to menu. Adjust access per: View %s added to menu. Adjust access permissions in Settings » Menu
The view name will appear as the title o: The view name will appear as the title of pop-ups showing this view, and in the URL when it is shown alone.

Fields you can use as variables:: Fields you can use as variables:
Use this to restrict your field to a lis: Use this to restrict your field to a list of options (separated by commas). For instance, if the permissible values are "Red", "Green" and "Blue", enter "Red, Green, Blue" here. Leave blank if the string can hold any value.
Specify the fields in the table to show: Specify the fields in the table to show
If user has write permission. Leave blan: If user has write permission. Leave blank to have no link to create a new item
Label in link or button to create. Leave: Label in link or button to create. Leave blank for a default label
These fields were missing, you can give: These fields were missing, you can give values here. The values you enter here can be overwritten by information coming from other views, for instance if the form is triggered from a list.
The view you choose here can be ignored: The view you choose here can be ignored depending on the context of the form, for instance if it appears in a pop-up the redirect will not take place.
If user has write permission. Leave bla: If user has write permission.  Leave blank to have no link to create a new item
